children.step: [{"step":"Gather ingredients"}, {"step":"Preheat oven to 425째F (218째C)"}, {"step":"Mix dry ingredients in a large bowl"}, {"step":"Add yeast and warm water; stir"}, {"step":"Gradually add wet ingredients to the dry mixture; knead until dough forms"}, {"step":"Place dough in a greased bowl, cover, and let rise for 1 hour"}, {"step":"Punch down dough, shape into a loaf, place in a greased baking pan"}, {"step":"Let dough rise again for 30 minutes"}, {"step":"Score the top of the loaf with a sharp knife"}, {"step":"Bake bread in preheated oven for 35-40 minutes"}, {"step":"Remove from oven, let cool on a wire rack"}]
Mix dry ingredients in a large bowl
Add yeast and warm water; stir
Gradually add wet ingredients to the dry mixture; knead until dough forms
Place dough in a greased bowl, cover, and let rise for 1 hour
Punch down dough, shape into a loaf, place in a greased baking pan
Let dough rise again for 30 minutes
Score the top of the loaf with a sharp knife
Bake bread in preheated oven for 35-40 minutes
Remove from oven, let cool on a wire rack
